name: Louis-Arnaud BOUQUIN
title: SAP Developer and Team Leader @ VISEO
professional_summary: Senior Technical Manager with 18 years of experience in SAP development and project management. Expert in ABAP, S/4 HANA, and SAP Business Technology Platform. Advanced skills in team leadership, quality control, and implementation of innovative solutions in complex and multicultural environments.

SAP_ECC.description: new Open SQL, constructor expression, method chaining

SAP_ECC.title: Classic SAP web development
SAP_ECC.description: ITS and ITS Mobile, Webdynpro ABAP

responsibilities: Technical leadership of major SAP projects
Strategic consulting on adoption of innovative SAP technologies

Driving skill enhancement in SAP technologies

Technical expertise on large-scale projects across different sectors

significant_projects.description: Development of a container/truck loading simulation application on ABAP BTP
achievements: Prototyping with Figma for optimal user experience
Development of a 3D interface for loading visualization
Integration with S/4HANA via OData API and communication arrangements
Logistics optimization through PTV Logistics API integration

significant_projects.description: Development of a catalog management and POSM order-taking application on ABAP BTP
achievements: Application design and prototyping with Figma
Backend development in ABAP Cloud using the RAP model
Seamless integration with S/4HANA via OData API
Implementation of an optimized ordering process for POSM items

significant_projects.description: S/4 HANA 1909 implementation for the Home Equipment sector
achievements: Development of mobile applications for points of sale (SAPUI5/Fiori with Cordova plugin)
Creation of Fiori Elements applications based on CDS/BOPF
Implementation of Embedded Analytics solutions for reporting
Development of REST and OData web service interfaces
Implementation of In-App extensions to customize standard functionalities

significant_projects.description: SAP HANA implementation for finance and logistics modules
achievements: Full-stack development of a Fiori application for telesales order-taking
Integration of Vistex add-on for promotions management
Optimization of financial and logistics processes
Development of 10 Fiori applications on SAP Cloud Platform

Complete administration of the cloud environment (Cloud Connector, Fiori Launchpad, SAP Cloud Identity)
Development of specific interfaces for integration with existing systems
Creation of ADOBE interactive forms and automation of email sending
Evolution of SAP Retail Store functionalities with creation of custom HTML screens
